sys_script_include.description: Creates a filter query expression similar to behavior provided by GlideRecord.addQuery with a few assumptions: - If one argument is passed, assume it is a complete encoded query expression similar to GlideRecord.addEncodedQuery - If two arguments, assume the operator is "=" - If three arguments are passed, assume the first is the field name, the second is the operator, and the third is the value - If more than three arguments are passed, join the arguments together as a string
sys_script_include.name: where
